original_text:
In the last days
the mountain of the Lord’s temple will be established
    as the highest of the mountains;
it will be exalted above the hills,
    and peoples will stream to it.
korean_text: 끝날에 이르러는 여호와의 전의 산이 산들의 꼭대기에 굳게 서며 작은 산들 위에 뛰어나고 민족들이 그리로 몰려갈 것이라

sentences.original_text: the mountain of the Lord's temple will be established
as the highest of the mountains
it will be exalted above the hills
and peoples will stream to it
